Really I don't hate the Ntr aspect I hate the characters indecision. You could have grabbed him by the balls and absolutely ended his family lineage right then and there when he poked you in the face with his dick, But out of respect for your friend you go along with it. You are his childhood friend you have more importance and if you brought this up to Taketo he would cut ties immediately if he truly cared about you. But instead of trusting in that bond you decide to "protect" him even though as Taketo grows up he will have to experience hardship you just made it easier on him because you helped him get Ntr'd in his high school days so he hardens up as he gets older effectively getting rid of the boy you wanted to protect in the first place. Really just riles me up when I know it's cheating but it's happening because the character is too conflicted on what to do.
